prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that resembles a pinecone and has a tough exterior.
I want to see a small, blue Pokemon that blends into forest environments seamlessly.
Generate a Pokemon with spiky features and a round body, perfect for camouflage.
Make a creature that looks like a pine cone and can defend itself with sharp spikes.
Imagine a Pokemon that can thrive in mountainous habitats and has a calm demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that is small and sturdy, ideal for hiding in trees.
Give me a creature that resembles a natural object and is known for its defensive abilities.
